import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import styles from '../CSS/ItemDetails.module.css'; const ItemDetail = ({itemId}) => { const [item, setItem] = useState(null); const { id } = useParams(); useEffect(() => { const fetchItem = async () => { try { const response = await fetch(`http://localhost:8080/api/v1/item/getItem/${id}`); const data = await response.json(); setItem(data); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching items:', error); } }; fetchItem(); }, [itemId]); if (!item) { return
Loading...
; } return ( <>
